name: VR-Extreme Moto Bike Racing Game 3d: City Racer
name_original: VR-Extreme Moto Bike Racing Game 3d: City Racer
description:
Keep the engines running and get ready to endless entertainment.
You will have to get behind the wheel of a sports Bike and take part in the Snowy Mountain Valley Fun!
Snow madness Drifting Racer is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade Drift racing.
Are you ready to become the best racer.
SO Get the ultimate drag racing bike game Now.

KEY FEATURES;
- Stunning 3D graphics.
- Excellent music.
- Smooth and realistic bike handling.
- Realistic bike physics Controlled.
- Detailed environments.
- iOS 7 MFi controller support.
- High-performance bike driven experience
- Slim size but run well on all android devices.
- Feeling of progress and skill improvement.

A must have game, In all your IOS devices.
